verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, If a \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* through \w ignorance|strong="H7684"\w* against any of the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add concerning things\add* which ought not to be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, and shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* against \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of \w them|strong="H2007"\w*:

If the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* that is \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* do \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* according to the \w sin|strong="H0819"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; then let him \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* for his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, which he hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, a \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

And he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and shall \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w bullock’s|strong="H6499"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* that is \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w bullock’s|strong="H6499"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* it to the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w dip|strong="H2881"\w* his \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* in the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add some\add* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which \add is\add* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*; and shall \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* all the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* at the \w bottom|strong="H3247"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, which \add is at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And he shall take \w off|strong="H7311"\w* from it all the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* for the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*, and all the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \add is\add* upon the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*,

And the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \add is\add* upon them, which \add is\add* by the \w flanks|strong="H3689"\w*, and the \w caul|strong="H3508"\w* above the \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*, with the \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, it shall he take \w away|strong="H5493"\w*,

As it was taken \w off|strong="H7311"\w* from the \w bullock|strong="H7794"\w* of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* them upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

And the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and all his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, with his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and with his \w legs|strong="H3767"\w*, and his \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*, and his \w dung|strong="H6569"\w*,

Even the whole \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* shall he carry \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* unto a \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, where the \w ashes|strong="H1880"\w* are poured \w out|strong="H8211"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* him on the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: \w where|strong="H0413"\w* the \w ashes|strong="H1880"\w* are poured \w out|strong="H8211"\w* shall he be \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w*.\f + \fr 4.12 \ft without…: Heb. to without the camp\f*\f + \fr 4.12 \ft where…: Heb. at the pouring out of the ashes\f*

¶ And if the whole \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* sin through \w ignorance|strong="H7686"\w*, and the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* be \w hid|strong="H5956"\w* from the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*, and they have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add somewhat against\add* \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add concerning things\add* which should not be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, and are \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w*;

When the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, which they have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against it, is \w known|strong="H3045"\w*, then the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* for the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* him \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* shall \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* shall be \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* that is \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* of the \w bullock’s|strong="H6499"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* to the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w dip|strong="H2881"\w* his \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* \add in some\add* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* \add it\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add even\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w*.

And he shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add some\add* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* which \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that \add is\add* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and shall pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* all the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* at the \w bottom|strong="H3247"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, which \add is at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.
And he shall \w take|strong="H7311"\w* all his \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* from him, and \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And he shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* with the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* as he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* with the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, so shall he \w do|strong="H6213"\w* with this: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for them, and it shall be \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* them.

And he shall carry \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* him as he \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*: it \add is\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* for the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*.

¶ When a \w ruler|strong="H5387"\w* hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, and \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add somewhat\add* through \w ignorance|strong="H7684"\w* \add against\add* \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add concerning things\add* which should not be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, and is \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w*;

Or if his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, wherein he hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, come to his \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*; he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*, a \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*, a \w male|strong="H2145"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

And he shall \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w goat|strong="H8163"\w*, and \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* it in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where they \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: it \add is\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* with his \w finger|strong="H0676"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and shall pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* at the \w bottom|strong="H3247"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

And he shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* all his \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, as the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him as concerning his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, and it shall be \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* him.

¶ And if \w any|strong="H0259"\w* \w one|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w common|strong="H0776"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* through \w ignorance|strong="H7684"\w*, while he \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \add somewhat against\add* \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add concerning things\add* which ought not to be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, and be \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w*;\f + \fr 4.27 \ft any one: Heb. any soul\f*\f + \fr 4.27 \ft common…: Heb. people of the land\f*

Or if his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, which he hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, come to his \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*: then he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*, a \w kid|strong="H8166"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*, a \w female|strong="H5347"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, for his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* which he hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*.

And he shall \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and \w slay|strong="H7819"\w* the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof with his \w finger|strong="H0676"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and shall pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* all the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof at the \w bottom|strong="H3247"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And he shall take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* all the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* thereof, as the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* is taken \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from off the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*; and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him, and it shall be \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* him.

And if he \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* a \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* for a \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*, he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* it a \w female|strong="H5347"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*.

And he shall \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and \w slay|strong="H7819"\w* it for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where they \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* with his \w finger|strong="H0676"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and shall pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* all the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof at the \w bottom|strong="H3247"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*:

And he shall take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* all the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* thereof, as the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of the \w lamb|strong="H3775"\w* is taken \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of the peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*; and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* them upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, according to the offerings made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* that he hath \w committed|strong="H2398"\w*, and it shall be \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* him.
